page.title: 20Chelmsford Council (2)
page.content: {Social Services Plan.}The County Council plan was criticised by members for its lack of clarity but it was agreed to ask for certain matters to be included. {Hospital Casualty Department. Members were reminded that from July 14th 1985 the facility would be at {Broomfield Hospital}instead of{Chelms- {ford & Essex. {Litter.}It was agreed that the{"Keep {Britain Tidy"}team be allowed to continue its local work for another year and that a further Â£1250 be requested to pay for this work. {Dog Loo.}After discussion a proposal to have one of these in a local park for a trial period was passed. { Straw & Stubble Burning.}Byelaws were introduced to{strengthen control}over this matter and it was agreed that the Government be asked to confirm them.
